content.question: Which statement about Jackson best explains the irony in the first sentence of the sixth paragraph (“He set . . . York”)?

choices.label: He is willing to get directions from “Jane” but not from Julia.
He is needs to use technology to locate a place that was once his home.
He does not understand how to utilize a tool that he owns.
He is attempting to use technology to find a place his heart longs for.

content.answer: He is attempting to use technology to find a place his heart longs for.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
